Class TransactionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectthree.TransactionManagerController
public class TransactionManagerController extends Object
Class that manages on action events for UI objects.
Author:
Abhishek Thakare, Adhit Thakur.

    • closeButtonAction

      public void closeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method that handles the close button account operation.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - button click event.

    • openButtonAction

      public void openButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method that handles the open button account operation.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - button click event.

    • oCommandHelper

      private void oCommandHelper(String firstName, String lastName, String dob, Account[] collection, AccountDatabase ad, DecimalFormat decimalFormat, double amount, String accountType)
      Helper for the open event button action.
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of the profile.
      lastName - last name of the profile.
      dob - date of birth for the profile.
      collection - collection of accounts that is being managed.
      ad - account database that is being manipulated.
      decimalFormat - formatter to convert the wanted initial deposit.
      amount - the actual initial deposit amount.
      accountType - which one of the four account types the account is.

    • oCommandHelperTwo

      private void oCommandHelperTwo(String accountType, Account[] collection, AccountDatabase ad, double res, Profile prof, Date date, int age)
      Additional helper method for the open button action.
      Parameters:
      accountType - which one of the four account types the account is.
      collection - collection of accounts that is being managed.
      ad - account database that is being manipulated.
      res - double conversion of initial deposit amount.
      prof - created profile for the account to be opened.
      date - date of the profile.
      age - age of the user.

    • oCommandSetCampusCode

      private CampusCode oCommandSetCampusCode(String campusC)
      Method to determine campus code for college checking.
      Parameters:
      campusC - campus code associated with account.
      Returns:
      a new campus code that will be stored.

    • oCommandFinalCheck

      private void oCommandFinalCheck(AccountDatabase ad, Account account, String accountType)
      Final helper method to process open account
      Parameters:
      ad - account database that is being manipulated.
      account - account created that will be added.
      accountType - which one of the four account types the account is.

      acc - account to be deposited from.
      type - type of account.
      prof - profile for the account.
      amountDouble - amount to be deposited.
      accountType - type of account.

      private Account loadCommandHelper(String[] parts, Double amountDouble, Profile prof)
      Helper method to process file contents and add accounts.
      Parameters:
      parts - text file line to be processed.
      amountDouble - amount to be deposited.
      prof - profile to be added.
      Returns:
